alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 2:48PM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From Friday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
